testsmellplugin.handlers

Class Handler1

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.commands.common.EventManager
      • org.eclipse.core.commands.AbstractHandler
        • testsmellplugin.handlers.Handler1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.core.commands.IHandler, org.eclipse.core.commands.IHandler2
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Handler2

    public class Handler1
extends org.eclipse.core.commands.AbstractHandler
    Detect Test Smell menu option based on sample handler extends AbstractHandler, an IHandler base class. for key binding please check plugin.xml
    See Also:
    IHandler, AbstractHandler

      • detectTestSmell

        public void detectTestSmell(java.io.File ProjectFile,
                            java.io.File TestClassFile)
        Detect test smell in given test class file in the range of project file write the test smell result into the singleton PluginCandidateProvider
        Parameters:

        TestClassFile - The diretory of test classes
